level.heading: Regulations.
level.text: The Commissioner may, in accordance with ยง 2-505, promulgate reasonable rules, regulations, or orders as are necessary or appropriate to carry out and effectuate the provisions of this chapter.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 13-265
level.text: For D.C. Law 13-265, see notes following ยง 31-2231.01.
